dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
PocketCloud Chat
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
com.pocketcloud.PocketCloudChat
PocketCloudChat
APPL
AppIcon
AppIcon
LaunchScreen
Default Configuration
PocketCloud Chat uses speech recognition to convert your voice input into text, allowing you to interact with the AI assistant hands-free.
PocketCloud Chat needs access to your microphone to enable voice input for hands-free interaction with the AI assistant.
PocketCloud Chat may use your camera to capture images for sharing with the AI assistant.
PocketCloud Chat may access your photo library to allow you to share images with the AI assistant.
PocketCloud Chat may save generated images or content to your photo library.
PocketCloud Chat may use your location to provide location-aware responses and context.
PocketCloud Chat may access your contacts to help with contact-related queries and tasks.
PocketCloud Chat may access your calendar to help with scheduling and event-related queries.
PocketCloud Chat may access your reminders to help manage tasks and to-do lists.
PocketCloud Chat may access motion data to enhance user experience and interactions.
PocketCloud Chat may use Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices and accessories.
PocketCloud Chat may access your local network to connect with compatible devices and services.
PocketCloud Chat may use Face ID to secure access to your conversations and settings.
PocketCloud Chat may integrate with Siri to provide voice assistant capabilities.
PocketCloud Chat would like to use data from other apps and websites to improve your experience and provide personalized content.
PocketCloud Chat may access your Apple Music library to help with music-related queries and tasks.
PocketCloud Chat may access your HomeKit accessories to help control your smart home devices.
